pullRequest.title: Updated name of encryption scope
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes EncryptionScope object to a String
Changes name of preventEncryptionScopeOverride to encryptionScopeOverridePrevented

commit.message: updated name of deny encryption scope override and changed encryption scope object

nodes.bodyText: this follows Cpk, though it feels weird but we need it for the specialized blob builder
Should the parameter be renamed to cpkScopeInfo or something along those lines.
This should be in the public API as this is taking as a parameter in public API methods.
Do we want to change {@link String encryption_scope} to {@code encryptionScope}? Right now this is going to create a link called encryption_scope that links to String.
Same comment as the other Javadoc comment.
Was the JSON element name supposed to change?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,8 +26,8 @@
      * from specifying a different encryption scope than the scope set on the
      * container.
      */
-    @JsonProperty(value = "preventEncryptionScopeOverride")
-    private boolean preventEncryptionScopeOverride;
+    @JsonProperty(value = "encryptionScopeOverridePrevented")
